recipesJson.name: Cosmic Fog Milk & Honey v1: DMC Cloning with the Crew
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
This is DMC's first attempt at Cosmic fog Milk & Honey.
Cloning with the Crew: Cosmic fog Milk & Honey Ep1.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qiuree9S7sY

reviews.text: I like that recipe. Everything fits.. <3

I  Mixed this for the Clone review and it pretty damn spot on ,,,, IMHO even more flavorful than the OG....... Mix this Up and let Us know......Mmmmm.... we are planning on a new release with the tweaks soon
